name: VWAP-RSI Crypto Momentum
description: Intraday momentum strategy trading BTC/USD and ETH/USD on 1-hour bars. Long when price closes above rolling VWAP and RSI(14) crosses above 60 with volume > 20-day average; short under symmetric bearish conditions. Exits via 1.5×ATR(14) trailing stop or RSI mean-reversion. Capital allocation 3 % of equity per trade, stop-loss floor 1 %.
